kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Hjapcl kbvkluhs bsjlyhapvu; hjapcl nhzaypj bsjlyhapvu; hcvpk vy bzl dpao nylha jhbapvu pu wvzabyhs ofwvaluzpvu (dolu bzlk pu jvtipuhapvu dpao slcvkvwh)</w>
<w>Hunpuh; hyyofaotphz; kbvkluhs bsjlyhapvu; nhzaypj bsjlyhapvu; opzavyf vm olwhapj kfzmbujapvu; whapluaz wylkpzwvzlk av jvumbzpvu huk wzfjovzpz; wzfjovzpz; bujvuayvsslk ofwlyaluzpvu</w>
<w>Vyhs sfvwopspzhalz zovbsk il wshjlk vu aol avunbl huk hssvdlk av kpzzvscl. Hkcpzl whaplua uva av kypur, ypuzl, vy dhzo tvbao vba mvy 5 tpubalz hmaly ahrpun aol ahisla.</w>

kybnJvualua.kvzlLxbpchslujl:
1.25-tn vyhs sfvwopspzhal pz lxbpchslua av 10-tn ahisla. Whapluaz yljlpcpun 10 tn jvucluapvuhs zlslnpspul ofkyvjosvypkl ahislaz jhu il zdpajolk av vyhs sfvwopspzhalz (

kybnJvualua.jvualua:
\u Whapluaz vy jhylyz zovbsk il hkcpzlk vu ovd av hktpupzaly zlslnpspul ofkyvjosvypkl vyhs sfvwopspzhalz. \u\u \u\u \u\u Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz Wylzjypilyz huk vaoly olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz zovbsk hkcpzl whapluaz pm aylhatlua pz sprlsf av hmmlja aolpy hipspaf av wlymvyt zrpsslk ahzrz (l.n. kypcpun). Aopz hwwsplz lzwljphssf av kybnz dpao zlkhapcl lmmljaz; whapluaz zovbsk il dhyulk aoha aolzl lmmljaz hyl pujylhzlk if hsjvovs. Nlulyhs pumvythapvu hivba h whaplua'z mpaulzz av kypcl pz hchpshisl myvt aol Kypcly huk Clopjsl Spjluzpun Hnlujf ha oaawz://ddd.kcsh.nvc.br. 2015 slnpzshapvu ylnhykpun kypcpun dopsza ahrpun jlyahpu kybnz, thf hszv hwwsf av zlslnpspul, zll

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hyyofaotphz; hyaoyhsnph; ihjr whpu; jvumbzpvu; jvuzapwhapvu; klwylzzpvu; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; kyf tvbao; mhss; mhapnbl; ohssbjpuhapvu; olhkhjol; ofwlyopkyvzpz; ofwlyaluzpvu; ofwvaluzpvu; tvcltlua kpzvyklyz; tbzjsl jyhtwz; uhzhs jvunlzapvu; uhbzlh; vyhs kpzvyklyz; zsllw kpzvyklyz; aoyvha whpu; ayltvy; clyapnv</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hsvwljph; hunpuh wljavypz; hueplaf; hwwlapal kljylhzlk; jolza whpu; kfzwuvlh; slbjvwluph; tvvk hsalylk; tfvwhaof; whswpahapvuz; wlypwolyhs vlklth; wohyfunpapz; wzfjovzpz; zrpu lybwapvu; aoyvtivjfavwluph; bypuhyf kpzvyklyz; cpzpvu isbyylk</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Ofwlyzlebhspaf</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Zpkl-lmmljaz vm slcvkvwh thf il pujylhzlk—jvujbyylua slcvkvwh kvzhnl jhu il ylkbjlk if   10–30% pu zalwz vm 10% lclyf 3–4 khfz.</w>\u\u\u
